text:
I'm getting a syntax error when using "Copy HubL" from a page editor in developer mode.

When I paste the content into a template that has module HTML fields, design manager yells at me for having escaped characters inside the HUBL code. Is there an easy fix? Find and replace doesn't even work because the characters are escaped.

I’ve never personally encountered any issues with using escape sequences for quotes or newlines in this way, so this is pretty unusual behavior. It’s especially weird that the error readout isn’t sanitizing your HTML before printing it.

Could you possibly share a bit more context, in case there’s anything else that might give it away? In particular, it’d be handy to see the entirety of the module tag and the rest of the error message. :)
